abstract.p: Systems and methods related to the play of games that include interim betting. Other embodiments are also disclosed.
Systems and methods related to the play of games that include interim betting. Other embodiments are also disclosed.
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a game using an intermediate bet in a system for playing a baccarat.

SOLUTION: The system is provided with a processor and a memory storing a plurality of commands and, when the plurality of commands are executed by the processor, at least, one index of a first card out of baccarat hands is offered to the system. Other embodiments are also disclosed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: JEU PERMETTANT DE PLACER UN PARI PROVISOIRE

abstract.p: Systems and methods related to the play of games that include interim betting. Some embodiments may provide players of a Baccarat Game with an opportunity to make interim bets during a hand of the game. For example, after one or more cards has been dealt to one or more of the Player and the Banker, players of a Baccarat game may be offered a chance to place a bet on the game with odds based on a then current state of the hand.

L'invention concerne des systèmes et procédés relatifs à des jeux permettant de placer des paris provisoires. Selon certains modes de réalisation, les joueurs d'un jeu de Baccarat peuvent avoir l'opportunité de placer des paris provisoires pendant une main du jeu. Par exemple, une fois qu'une ou plusieurs cartes ont été distribuées au joueur et/ou à la banque, les joueurs d'un jeu de Baccarat peuvent avoir une chance de placer un pari sur le jeu avec une cote basée sur l'état actuel de la main.
